name: Hoi An Motorbike Street Food Tour Half Day
description: Are you feeling really adventurous and might even try to eat at street vendors that most foreigners would be skeptical to try? Hoi An Food tour focus on street food which you would not get if you were just a tourist walking around by yourself. You will discover some hidden Hoi An streets at the back of our tour guides ‘motorbikes. Our enthusiastic tour guides will show you best place to eat with Hoi An styles of eating as well as offer much insights to the street food than meets the eyes. This is a foodie tour so make sure that you join with your empty stomach
